title: Cylindrically rotate a matrix by 90 degrees
contentHtml:
Write a program to cylindrically rotate a matrix by 90 degrees

Input  :
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9

Output :
7 4 1
8 5 2
9 6 3

"use strict";

let N = 3;

function rotate90Clockwise(arr) {
  for (let j = 0; j < N; j++) {
    for (let i = N - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
      process.stdout.write(arr[i][j] + " ");
    }
    console.log();
  }
}

let arr = [
  [1, 1, 1],
  [2, 2, 2],
  [3, 3, 3],
];

console.log("Initial matrix:");
for (let i = 0; i < N; i++) {
  for (let j = 0; j < N; j++) {
    process.stdout.write(arr[i][j] + " ");
  }
  console.log();
}

console.log("\nRotated matrix:");
rotate90Clockwise(arr);

N = 3;
  
def rotate90Degrees(arr) :
    global N;
      
    for j in range(N) :
        for i in range(N - 1, -1, -1) :
            print(arr[i][j], end = " ")
        print()
          
arr = [ [ 1, 2, 3],
        [ 4, 5, 6],
        [ 7, 8, 9] ]

rotate90Degrees(arr);

"use strict";

let N = 3;

function rotate90Clockwise(arr) {
  for (let j = 0; j < N; j++) {
    for (let i = N - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
      process.stdout.write(arr[i][j] + " ");
    }
    console.log();
  }
}

let arr = [
  [1, 1, 1],
  [2, 2, 2],
  [3, 3, 3],
];

console.log("Initial matrix:");
for (let i = 0; i < N; i++) {
  for (let j = 0; j < N; j++) {
    process.stdout.write(arr[i][j] + " ");
  }
  console.log();
}

console.log("\nRotated matrix:");
rotate90Clockwise(arr);
